name: Menddle
content:
Menddle was a Mon Calamari pilot. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, he was the only pilot at the Mensix Mining Facility on Mustafar willing to fly a group of spacers into a volcano to battle the assassin droid HK-47.
Menddle appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
